abstract: Novartis is buying the injectable generic cancer drugs business of Austria’s EBEWE Pharma and may pursue other similar deals.
snippet: Novartis is buying the injectable generic cancer drugs business of Austria’s EBEWE Pharma and may pursue other similar deals.
lead_paragraph: Novartis is buying the injectable generic cancer drug business of Austria’s Ebewe Pharma and may pursue other similar deals as it fleshes out a planned diversification away from brand-name treatments, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Novartis Pays $1.2 Billion for Cancer Drug Unit
